subject: DIRECT GLOBAL SHIPPING COMPANY
body:
DIRECT GLOBAL SHIPPING COMPANY
BRANCH : 32  AWOLOWO ROAD, IKOYI .LAGOS – NIGERIA.
HEAD OFFICE : CHICAGO CITY , UNITED STATE
                ****** DGL SHIPMENT PACKAGE DELIVERY NOTIFICATION ******
                              Greetings from  Direct Global Shipping
Company , The
Management of this company, wishes to inform you that, we received a
Package Containing An ATM Master Card Worth US$5,000,000.00
(Five Million United State Dollars) with some vital documents attached
 On it for safety delivery to your home address in your country.
This parcel was brought to us this morning by the ATM Card payment
Office/Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF) as your inheritance approved
Fund to be delivered to you, without delay,
 
Kindly reconfirm the   Below  information, to avoid Wrong  Delivery
of your Package.
Full names..............................................
Parcel owner address..............................
Phone......................................................
Occupation..............................................
Copy of ID CARD
 :>>>>>>>……………
We will register your package and send you the tracking numbers before
in order to
Proceed for safety delivery of your package as soon as you reconfirm
The required information's for safety delivery.
                               ______THANKS & REGARD_________
Mr. George Daniel
Chief Executive Officer Dhl Global Company
Whatsapp line : +234-9057200381
Direct line: +1(714) 477 9985

subject: Re: DIRECT GLOBAL SHIPPING COMPANY
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the delivery of an ATM Master Card worth US Five Million United State Dollars. However, before proceeding, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure everything is in order.

1. Can you please provide more details about the origin of this package? How did it come to be in your possession?

2. What are the vital documents attached to the ATM Master Card? Could you please specify what they are for?

3. Is there any reason why this package needs to be delivered through your company instead of a more traditional banking method?

I look forward to your response and further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Alan

subject: Re: DIRECT GLOBAL SHIPPING COMPANY
body:
*DHL Express Courier service32 Awolowo Rd, Ikoyi, Lagos.HEAD OFFICE :
CHICAGO CITY , UNITED STATE
 ---------PACKAGE  DELIVERY PROCEDURE ----------*

from the United Nation Organization in line with the International

Express Company ,and i want you to reconfirm the following details
so we can commence with the delivery of your card without any much delay:

Note : As soon as you reconfirm the required information , We would register
your package and send you the tracking numbers before we

*      ****** We are waiting for your urgent response *************Mr.
George DanielChief Executive Officer Dhl Global CompanyWhatsapp line :
+234-9057200381Direct line: +1(714) 477 9985 *

subject: Re: DIRECT GLOBAL SHIPPING COMPANY
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in delivering my package. However, before I provide any further information, could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Can you confirm the sender of the package and what it contains?
2. How did the United Nations and Monetary Fund Department get involved in this delivery?
3. Is there any specific reason why Mr. George Daniel, the Chief Executive Official, needs my ID card picture?

Once I have these details clarified, I will be happy to proceed with providing the necessary information.

Best wishes,
Alan
